Name: SPLAIT RAGE
About the game: SPLAIT RAGE is a 2D action adventure where you play as Agent Carter. Armed with your trusty pistol, you're on your way to clear uncharted territory of your enemies! Be careful, your ammo is limited, there are many traps and evil enemies everywhere. Can you take them down in this quirky platformer/shooter hybrid? Collect ammo and secret data envelopes that contain a pass to the next level. Go through all the deadly traps and prove to everyone that you are the champion! Peculiarities: - Nice graphics by Leonsy - Nice soundtrack by Irionti - an unforgettable adventure
